data.title: Fangzhou teams up with Youcare Pharma to improve chronic care services using AI, boosting digital transformation.
data.description: The collaboration is focused on expediting the digital transformation and improvement of chronic disease offerings by leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) techniques.

data.title: Bearish UNI price prediction targets $3.34 support as indicators flash warnings. Resistance at $3.61, RSI at 46.64. Support at $3.48 critical to avoid drop to $3.34.
data.description: The forecast for the price of UNI indicates increasing bearish sentiment at $3.61, with the Relative Strength Index (RSI) hovering neutrally at 46.64. Analysis suggests that maintaining immediate support at $3.48 is vital to avoid a potential further decline to $3.34.

data.title: AVAX expected to reach $12-$15 by April 2026 with current price at $8.59. Analysts cite key resistance at $9.78.
data.description: The digital currency Avalanche (AVAX) is currently trading at $8.59, with the Relative Strength Index (RSI) sitting at 40.25, indicating a neutral stance. Analysts foresee potential price targets ranging between $12 and $15 in the upcoming 4-6 weeks. However, in order to reach these targets, AVAX must surpass the key resistance level of $9.78 with a breakout.

data.title: DOT price aims for $1.76 in March with analysts optimistic despite recent 7.57% drop to $1.49. Short-term target: $1.63.
data.description: The cryptocurrency Polkadot (DOT) has set a target of $1.76, despite experiencing a recent decrease of 7.57% to $1.49. Analysts remain optimistic about its potential for growth, with a short-term target of $1.76.

data.title: By April 2026, MATIC price may reach $0.45-$0.52, trading at $0.38 now. Analysts see 18-37% upside after breaking $0.58.
data.description: The current trading price of Polygon (MATIC) is $0.38. Analysts anticipate a potential increase of 18-37%, estimating the price to reach between $0.45 to $0.52 within the next 4-6 weeks, provided the $0.58 resistance level is surpassed.

data.title: DOGE dips 9.42% to $0.09 with RSI at 38.53. Forecast predicts $0.11-$0.16 range if bulls regain momentum amid bearish signs.
data.description: The value of Dogecoin has dropped to $0.09, finding support at this level as indicated by the Relative Strength Index (RSI) at 38.53. Based on technical analysis, forecasts for the price of DOGE indicate a target range of $0.11 to $0.16 if buyers regain control and push the market upwards, despite the prevailing bearish indicators.

data.title: Solana's (SOL) price falls to $78.86 on bearish trend; may reach $95-105 by March if $75 support holds.
data.description: The price of SOL has decreased to $78.86 due to a strong downward trend, but there is optimism for a potential rebound to the $95-105 range in the next four weeks if buyers can maintain support at $75. This technical analysis highlights the possibility of a positive turnaround in the near future.

data.title: ADA price dips 9% to $0.27, eyes $0.34 recovery. RSI neutral, bull flag indicates potential surge.
data.description: Cardano's cryptocurrency, ADA, has recently experienced a 9.36% decrease in value, resulting in a trading price of $0.27. Despite this decline, technical analysis indicates a potential target of $0.34. The Relative Strength Index (RSI) remains neutral, and a bull flag formation suggests a forthcoming recovery.

data.title: XRP price at $1.33 eyes $1.46 breakout amid mixed indicators. Support at $1.29 key for potential bounce.
data.description: The cryptocurrency XRP is currently trading at $1.33 amidst a downward trend, but it is edging closer to oversold territory. Analysts using technical indicators predict a possible price increase to $1.46 if the support level at $1.29 remains intact.

data.title: BNB may rise to $650-670 in March due to oversold conditions. Key breakout above $624 could trigger recovery.
data.description: Analysis of technical indicators indicates that Binance Coin is currently oversold and could potentially experience a rebound. If a key breakout occurs above $624, the coin may see a rise towards the resistance zone of $650-670. The price prediction for Binance Coin suggests targets of $650-670 for potential recovery.

data.title: OpenAI secures defense contract after US government cuts ties with Anthropic, deploying AI models on Pentagon systems.
data.description: OpenAI has been authorized to utilize its AI models on secure Pentagon networks following a directive from the US government instructing agencies to discontinue employing competing Anthropic due to national security worries.

data.title: Nvidia's stock drops 9% after strong earnings, with investor focus shifting to uncertainty for 2027 growth at 31%. Data center sales at nearly 90%.
data.description: Investors are turning away from NVIDIA Corp (NASDAQ: NVDA) as they shift their focus from the strong earnings in 2026 to uncertainties surrounding 2027, according to analyst Gene Munster. The chip designer's stock fell approximately 9% in the two sessions following earnings, in contrast to the Nasdaq Composite's 2% drop. Munster pointed out in a blog post that while revenue growth used to be the main driver, investors are now more concerned about the growth prospects for 2027. Analysts project a 31% growth in 2027, higher than previous estimates, leading to a debate on whether these figures are too conservative or too uncertain for investors to consider presently. Data center sales, which make up nearly 90% of revenue, are mainly driven by hyperscalers accounting for half of the business. Though there is a better distribution of customers, a small number of big buyers still dominate the market.

data.title: BTC may hit $72,000 by March: Currently at $65,580, oversold RSI poses a bullish rebound opportunity. Technical signals hint at further gains post resistance breach.
data.description: The current trading price of Bitcoin is $65,580, showing a bearish trend. However, the oversold Relative Strength Index (RSI) indicates a possible bounce in the near future. Technical analysis forecasts a potential upside target of $72,000 if the resistance level is surpassed.

data.title: ETH expected to reach $2,100-$2,200 by March 2026, with oversold conditions at $1,880 and RSI at 37.
data.description: The cryptocurrency Ethereum is currently experiencing oversold conditions, with its price at $1,880 and Relative Strength Index (RSI) at 37. According to technical analysis, there is a potential for a rebound to the range of $2,100 to $2,200 if crucial support levels remain intact throughout March.

data.title: Navigara launches Performance Layer for Enterprise Engineering Teams with $2.5M funding to prove AI tools improve performance and ROI.
data.description: In San Francisco on Feb. 28, 2026, a new performance layer for contemporary engineering is aiding leaders in verifying if AI tools genuinely enhance performance and return on investment. Despite engineering teams currently delivering a high volume of code, many leaders struggle to address critical queries on whether these improvements truly enhance performance and ROI.

data.title: YOFC to unveil Hollow-Core Fibre solution at MWC Barcelona 2026, advancing optical connectivity with ultra-low latency technology. Strengthening global AI infrastructure.
data.description: In Barcelona, Spain on February 28, 2026, Yangtze Optical Fibre and Cable (YOFC) is set to present cutting-edge ultra-low latency optical communication technology, aiming to bolster the global AI network. This move reflects the company's commitment to advancing infrastructure for AI, with a focus on next-generation solutions. The event will feature YOFC's newest developments in optical technology, showcasing their dedication to innovation in the field.

data.title: Ex-CEO of Mt. Gox proposes hard fork to retrieve 80K stolen Bitcoin after 12-year bankruptcy, calling it the final hurdle.
data.description: Mark Karpelès recently mentioned that it has been 12 years since the commencement of Mt. Gox's bankruptcy proceedings, stating that this marks a significant milestone in the case. Karpelès expressed his belief that this could potentially be the final challenging aspect remaining to be resolved in relation to the case.

data.title: Cutting-edge geothermal tech to generate carbon-free power in Germany. Heading for environmental goals.
data.description: In recent reports, it has been revealed that there has been a surge in unemployment rates, with a staggering increase of 2.3% in the last quarter. This rise has seen the total number of unemployed individuals reach a record high of 7.2 million. Additionally, the report highlights a concerning trend of job losses in various sectors, such as manufacturing and hospitality, with an estimated 300,000 jobs lost in these areas alone. The government has expressed their intentions to implement measures to address this concerning issue and provide support to those affected by the increase in unemployment.

data.title: Dow Jones Futures drop below 50-day moving averages due to Trump's impact on market ETFs. S&P 500 shows strong stocks.
data.description: Currently, the main stock market indexes are trading under their 50-day moving averages. Despite this, there is notable underlying strength in the market. President Trump's significant move has impacted market exchange-traded funds (ETFs), emphasizing the importance of keeping an eye on the hottest stocks in the S&P 500 index. The market conditions suggest a mixed trend, with key indexes pointing downward while individual stock performances may offer opportunities for investors.

data.title: China's path of democracy protects people's rights: CGTN report on Two Sessions highlights grassroots democracy and its impact.
data.description: Leading up to China's yearly significant political gatherings - the Two Sessions, a recent report discussed by CGTN details the functionality of China's full-scale participatory democracy at the local level and its role in protecting the rights and welfare of the citizens. This analysis offers in-depth insights into China's...
